main event: A witness reported seeing an oblong to round reddish to orange object in the sky over Claremont, New Hampshire on June 27, 1960.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 2-3 minutes,The object was first seen in the ESE and last seen in the NNE,It was observed moving easterly to westerly at a speed of about 200 mph,The report was received several weeks after the sighting occurred,The evaluation notes that the report is considered to have insufficient data.
sighted object: one oblong to round reddish to orange object
